meta.description: Chief Gear strategy and upgrade priorities
meta.data_source: chief_equipment_data.json is the authoritative source for slot names and stats
related_files: data/chief_equipment_data.json - Slot definitions, tier progression, materials

slots.description: 6 Chief Gear slots, 2 per troop type. Each provides Attack AND Defense for its troop type.
slots.note: No universal slots exist. All gear is troop-type specific.

set_bonuses.description: Set bonuses apply to ALL troop types when you have enough pieces at the same tier

bonuses.3_piece: Defense boost for ALL troop types
bonuses.6_piece: Attack boost for ALL troop types

set_bonuses.critical_insight: Keep all 6 pieces at the same tier to maximize set bonuses before pushing individual pieces higher

upgrade_priority.strategy: Keep all 6 pieces at same tier for set bonuses, then upgrade by troop importance
order: 1. Get all 6 pieces to same tier (for 6-piece Attack bonus)
2. Infantry (Coat, Pants) - Frontline, engage first, need survivability
4. Lancer (Cap, Watch) - Mid-line support, lowest priority

reasoning.why_same_tier_first: 6-piece set bonus gives Attack to ALL troops - more valuable than boosting one troop type
reasoning.why_infantry_first: Infantry engage first in battle, form frontline, need stats to survive and protect Marksman
reasoning.why_marksman_second: Primary damage dealers - their Attack stats directly increase kill rate
reasoning.why_lancer_last: Less exposed to direct fire, lowest priority for most compositions

spender_paths.core_principle: Spender level determines how much inefficiency you can afford. F2P must be near-perfect.

chief_gear.strategy: Keep all 6 pieces at same tier. Upgrade Infantry pieces first when moving to next tier.

rules: Only field PvP or solo use

chief_gear.strategy: Same tier priority, can push Infantry slightly ahead

rules: Must be used across multiple modes

chief_gear.strategy: Infantry to Pink early. Other pieces can follow closer behind.
Max everything quickly. No opportunity cost concern.

chief_gear.set_bonus_scope: ALL troops when set bonus active
chief_gear.mode_coverage: 100% - rallies, field PvP, garrison, Bear Trap, Crazy Joe, SvS

investment_hierarchy: 1. Chief Gear (all 6 pieces to same tier)
2. Chief Gear Infantry (Coat, Pants) to next tier
3. Chief Gear Marksman (Belt, Weapon) to next tier
4. Chief Gear Lancer (Cap, Watch) to next tier
5. Hero Gear on long-term core heroes (rally leaders, field PvP)

common_mistakes.mistake: Upgrading one piece to max before others
common_mistakes.correction: Keep all 6 pieces at same tier for set bonuses. 6-piece Attack bonus helps ALL troops.

common_mistakes.mistake: Prioritizing Lancer or Marksman gear over Infantry
common_mistakes.correction: Infantry engage first and form frontline. Their survivability protects your damage dealers.
Chief Gear set bonuses affect ALL troops. Hero Gear only affects one hero. Chief Gear first.
Rally joiners only contribute one expedition skill. Their gear stats barely matter. Chief Gear still fully applies.
